overview: In this 1940s noir-style surreal thriller, our hero (Alex Boling) seems fixated on wingtip shoes. Under loose floor boards in a dark attic he finds a shoebox containing the wingtips of his dreams. After a meticulous shining, he puts them on and embarks on a journey of self-discovery where danger lurks around every corner and imminent disaster grows closer with every step he takes.
title: Wingtips
